import re

def replace_cats_with_dogs(string):
    pattern = ''
    new_string = re.sub(pattern, 'dog', string)
    return new_string

import re

def replace_cats_with_dogs(string):
    pattern = '\\bcat\\b(?!(egory|erpillar))'
    new_string = re.sub(pattern, '', string)
    return new_string
